name: Booster Blade
description:
The world is on the edge of collapse, a giant sword is strapped to your arm, and you can NEVER STOP MOVING. This is BOOSTER BLADE.

Boost through breakable blocks, slash through enemies, and frantically weave around danger in this straightforward, old-school action game! Everything's stacked against you, but you have to keep moving forward. Turn the burden you carry into your greatest weapon, and become an unstoppable force!

  • Aim to blast through stages as efficiently as possible, demolishing past records
  • Uncover an over-the-top story that unfolds through conversations between each stage
  • Enjoy a high-energy, chiptune-infused soundtrack

Booster Blade is a student project that was originally created for the GMU 2022 Senior Expo! We hope you enjoy the culmination of our work.
